column1: #Text=Katara says : " This should bring your fever down . "
#Text=Sokka says : " You know what I love about Appa the most ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Not so good , being out in that storm really did a number on him .
#Text=" Aang says : " I could n't find any ginger root for the tea .
#Text=There 's an herbalist institute on top of that mountain .
#Text=We could probably find a cure for Sokka there .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , he 's in no condition for travel .
#Text=I 'm sure he 'll be better by tomorrow .
#Text=" Katara says : " Relax , it was just a little cough .
#Text=I 'm fi - " Aang says : " That 's how Sokka started yesterday .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Take that , you rock !
#Text=" Aang says : " A few more hours and you 'll be talking nonsense , too .
#Text=I 'm going to go find some medicine !
#Text=Uh , maybe it 's safer if I go on foot .
